abstract.text: An interface to the PIV application on the YubiKey.

topicSections.title: Running commands in the PIV application

inlineContent.text: The PIVSession is an interface to the Personal Identity Verification (PIV) application on the YubiKey.
It supports importing, generating and using private keys. Reading and writing data objects such as
X.509 certificates and managing access (PIN, PUK, etc).

Reads metadata about the private key stored in a slot.

Set a new management key.

An interface to the OATH application on the YubiKey.
Connect and run commands on the different applications on a YubiKey. The framework support connecting using NFC, Lightning and USB.
